players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was the one who was killed on the first night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and try to figure out why she might have been targeted."

You: "Bob seems very eager to analyze Diana's death and steer the conversation. That kind of immediate leadership could be suspicious - maybe he's trying to control the narrative?"
